channel.title: Error connecting to server [508]
channel.description:
I have been hosting my server for around 10 days now (average of 22 hours online each day!, without vps!).
All of the sudden Nobody (INCLUDING ME) can connect anymore! it'll show: [code] Error connecting to server [/code] within like 1/100th of a second (instant).
It happened after my server crashed, I tried removing all saved characters etc, didn't do anything. People can join my server if I change source, so it's really the source...
If anybody has any experience with this error.. or knows how to fix it.. Please share it with me ^_^!

item.title: Error connecting to server [508]
item.dc:creator: @Frozen_pvpers Frozen pvpers
item.description:
@Frozen_pvpers wrote:

Sorry for the late reply, I got it fixed already

apperantly it was a missing save file in data :S

Read full topic

Are you connecting with 127.0.0.1 or with your IP?

item.title: Error connecting to server [508]
item.dc:creator: @Frozen_pvpers Frozen pvpers
item.description:
@Frozen_pvpers wrote:

I have been hosting my server for around 10 days now (average of 22 hours online each day!, without vps!).

All of the sudden Nobody (INCLUDING ME) can connect anymore!
it’ll show:

 Error connecting to server

within like 1/100th of a second (instant).

It happened after my server crashed, I tried removing all saved characters etc, didn’t do anything.
People can join my server if I change source, so it’s really the source…

If anybody has any experience with this error… or knows how to fix it… Please share it with me ^_^!
